name: La Begude du Pascouren

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed over just for one night, and was met with hospitality, friendliness and a lovely room, pool area and garden. Just a few minutes from the perched village of Fayence. Lovely room with a bathroom and private terracce on the outside. Free blackberrys and peaches from the garden also. Breakfast by the pool area was also very nice. Try it! Good value for money and really relaxing if that's what your looking for. Ideal for excursions in the area.
reviews.title: Friendly atmosphere, excellent facility

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stopped over here for a one night stay in September, getting the worst bits out the way first - the owner took the full fee as soon as we booked it (no deposit) and when we arrived with our two dogs he came to meet us but spent the next half hour telling us what we could and could not do (maybe we both were tired - but he did go on and on and on.....) That said, the actual location has private off road parking, a number of tastefully finished (small) rooms, lovely little garden, swimming pool and surrounds - all very smart. We thoroughly enjoyed breakfast by the pool that had a view of the mountains. Whilst we were not impressed with the owner(?) afterwards we were dealt with his colleague; Gerd - who was absolutely delightful.
reviews.title: Picture Perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for three days in this very professionally run chambre d'hote. The place is simply beautiful and meets the highest of standards. The service is discrete and charming, as are the proprietors. Quite simply one of the best places we have ever stayed in France, and although slightly more expensive than some, it is well worth it. Don't all rush at once, as we want to come back and find availabilty !
reviews.title: Superb Chambre d'hote

reviews.text: The room (Les Lavendes) is beautifully laid out & furnished, with great little touches. The whole setting is perfect and so relaxing, lying round the pool or walking through the garden. Nothing is too much trouble for the owner Philippe and his attention to detail makes the property very special. I cannot recommend it enough if you are wishing to explore the region.
reviews.title: Total Perfection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Back for our third visit to Begoude, we enjoyed the facilities of our sumptuous apartment, the terrace and the pool. The bright lights of Cannes are half an hour away, but we made the most of the beautiful scenery by car, by bike and on foot. Private and tranquil: a find!
reviews.title: A delightful place with charming hosts.

description: Well appointed Bed and Breakfast, "La Bégude du Pascouren" is a unique place in Provence-Côte d'Azur located between the sea and the mountains and situated in the heart of the "Pays de Fayence" with its eight hilltop villages.It's an ideal base for the region's numerous tourist attractions and pursuits: Golf, gliding and micro light flying at Fayence, pedalos and kayaks at the Lac de St.
